rooms.description: Serves as the primary entrance from the West-facing front door, leading into the living space. Vastu principles advise that the main entry should face East; however, with a west-facing plot, design modifications ensure proper energy flow through strategic placement of windows and reflective surfaces.

Spacious area designed for relaxation and family interactions. Features contemporary aesthetics with natural light maximization via large, north-facing windows. Includes built-in storage solutions and modern furniture layout.
Adjacent to the living room, designed for formal dining settings. Incorporates a contemporary kitchenette within view of the dining table to encourage family interaction.
Larger bedroom with ample space and privacy. Features an ensuite bathroom. Oriented towards the north for better light exposure while considering Vastu principles of health and wealth.
Functional guest room with sufficient storage and a calming ambiance. Positioned to maintain privacy yet remain integrated within the house layout.
Modern kitchen designed for efficiency and convenience, featuring state-of-the-art appliances. Placement respects Vastu by aligning with the east or northeast corner where possible.
Dedicated space for laundry, storage of cleaning supplies, and other utilities to keep main living areas clutter-free.

openings.description: Designed with modern aesthetics and reinforced materials. Considered for Vastu adjustments through additional design elements like a welcoming arch.
Large window to maximize natural light and ventilation. Complies with Vastu by ensuring proper energy flow.
Optimized for morning light and tranquility in line with Vastu principles.
Provides access to the two-car garage. Designed with reinforced materials and modern safety features.
